mods.abstract: A wagonload of decoys being transferred to a houseboat at the beginning of the season, Havre de Grace, Md., c. 1900. The steam tug Baltimore (background) upset during a storm, killing her crew. Many vessels of her class did the same thing because they were topheavy. Left to right: Lewis Mergler, Lee Hawkins, Ed. Goak, Wm. Fadeley, Arthur Deppish, Ed Poplar, Barry Woods, Curly Way.

titleInfo.title: Louisiana Sea Grant Digital Images Collection

mods.note: Walsh, Harry M. The Outlaw Gunner. Centreville, Maryland: Tidewater Publishers, 1971.
